   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Tests of application_opt() request_errors. There's some overlap
   23: %% between this suite and the traffic suite but latter exercises more
   24: %% config.
   25: %%
   26: 
   27: -module(diameter_3xxx_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: %% testcases, no common_test dependency
   30: -export([run/0,
   31:          run/1]).
   32: 
   33: %% common_test wrapping
   34: -export([suite/0,
   35:          all/0,
   36:          traffic/1]).
   37: 
   38: %% internal
   39: -export([send_unknown_application/1,
   40:          send_unknown_command/1,
   41:          send_ok/1,
   42:          send_invalid_hdr_bits/1,
   43:          send_missing_avp/1,
   44:          send_ignore_missing_avp/1,
   45:          send_5xxx_missing_avp/1,
   46:          send_double_error/1,
   47:          send_3xxx/1,
   48:          send_5xxx/1]).
   49: 
   50: %% diameter callbacks
   51: -export([peer_up/3,
   52:          peer_down/3,
   53:          pick_peer/5,
   54:          prepare_request/4,
   55:          handle_answer/5,
   56:          handle_error/5,
   57:          handle_request/3]).
   58: 
   59: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter.hrl").
   60: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter_gen_base_rfc6733.hrl").
   61: %% Use the fact that STR/STA is identical in RFC's 3588 and 6733.
   62: 
   63: %% ===========================================================================
   64: 
   65: -define(util, diameter_util).
   66: -define(testcase(), get(?MODULE)).
   67: 
   68: -define(L, atom_to_list).
   69: -define(A, list_to_atom).
   70: 
   71: -define(CLIENT, "CLIENT").
   72: -define(SERVER, "SERVER").
   73: -define(REALM, "erlang.org").
   74: -define(HOST(Host, Realm), Host ++ [$.|Realm]).
   75: 
   76: -define(ERRORS, [answer, answer_3xxx, callback]).
   77: -define(RFCS, [rfc3588, rfc6733]).
   78: -define(DICT(RFC), ?A("diameter_gen_base_" ++ ?L(RFC))).
   79: -define(DICT, ?DICT(rfc6733)).
   80: 
   81: -define(COMMON, ?DIAMETER_APP_ID_COMMON).
   82: 
   83: %% Config for diameter:start_service/2.
   84: -define(SERVICE(Name, Errors, RFC),
   85:         [{'Origin-Host', Name ++ "." ++ ?REALM},
   86:          {'Origin-Realm', ?REALM},
   87:          {'Host-IP-Address', [{127,0,0,1}]},
   88:          {'Vendor-Id', 12345},
   89:          {'Product-Name', "OTP/diameter"},
   90:          {'Auth-Application-Id', [?COMMON]},
   91:          {application, [{dictionary, ?DICT(RFC)},
   92:                         {module, ?MODULE},
   93:                         {answer_errors, callback},
   94:                         {request_errors, Errors}]}]).
   95: 
   96: -define(LOGOUT, ?'DIAMETER_BASE_TERMINATION-CAUSE_LOGOUT').
   97: 
   98: %% ===========================================================================
   99: 
  100: suite() ->
  101:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 90}}].
  102: 
  103: all() ->
  104:     [traffic].
  105: 
  106: traffic(_Config) ->
  107:     run().
  108: 
  109: %% ===========================================================================
  110: 
  111: tc() ->
  112:     [send_unknown_application,
  113:      send_unknown_command,
  114:      send_ok,
  115:      send_invalid_hdr_bits,
  116:      send_missing_avp,
  117:      send_ignore_missing_avp,
  118:      send_5xxx_missing_avp,
  119:      send_double_error,
  120:      send_3xxx,
  121:      send_5xxx].
  122: 
  123: %% run/0
  124: 
  125: run() ->
  126:     ?util:run([[{{?MODULE, run, [{E,D}]}, 60000} || E <- ?ERRORS,
  127:                                                     D <- ?RFCS]]).
  128: 
  129: %% run/1
  130: 
  131: run({F, [_,_] = G}) ->
  132:     put(?MODULE, F),
  133:     apply(?MODULE, F, [G]);
  134: 
  135: run({E,D}) ->
  136:     try
  137:         run([E,D])
  138:     after
  139:         ok = diameter:stop()
  140:     end;
  141: 
  142: run([Errors, RFC] = G) ->
  143:     Name = ?L(Errors) ++ "," ++ ?L(RFC),
  144:     ok = diameter:start(),
  145:     ok = diameter:start_service(?SERVER, ?SERVICE(Name, Errors, RFC)),
  146:     ok = diameter:start_service(?CLIENT, ?SERVICE(?CLIENT,
  147:                                                   callback,
  148:                                                   rfc6733)),
  149:     LRef = ?util:listen(?SERVER, tcp),
  150:     ?util:connect(?CLIENT, tcp, LRef),
  151:     ?util:run([{?MODULE, run, [{F,G}]} || F <- tc()]),
  152:     _ = counters(G),
  153:     ok = diameter:remove_transport(?CLIENT, true),
  154:     ok = diameter:remove_transport(?SERVER, true),
  155:     ok = diameter:stop_service(?SERVER),
  156:     ok = diameter:stop_service(?CLIENT).
  157: 
  158: %% counters/1
  159: %%
  160: %% Check that counters are as expected.
  161: 
  162: counters([_Errors, _RFC] = G) ->
  163:     [] = ?util:run([[fun counters/3, K, S, G]
  164:                     || K <- [statistics, transport, connections],
  165:                        S <- [?CLIENT, ?SERVER]]).
  166: 
  167: counters(Key, Svc, Group) ->
  168:     counters(Key, Svc, Group, [_|_] = diameter:service_info(Svc, Key)).
  169: 
  170: counters(statistics, Svc, [Errors, Rfc], L) ->
  171:     [{P, Stats}] = L,
  172:     true = is_pid(P),
  173:     stats(Svc, Errors, Rfc, lists:sort(Stats));
  174: 
  175: counters(_, _, _, _) ->
  176:     todo.
  177: 
  178: stats(?CLIENT, E, rfc3588, L)
  179:   when E == answer;
  180:        E == answer_3xxx ->
  181:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  182:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  183:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  184:      {{{0,275,0},recv},6},
  185:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  186:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  187:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  188:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  189:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  190:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  191:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  192:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  193:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},1}]
  194:         = L;
  195: 
  196: stats(?SERVER, E, rfc3588, L)
  197:   when E == answer;
  198:        E == answer_3xxx ->
  199:     [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  200:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  201:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  202:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  203:      {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  204:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  205:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  206:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  207:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  208:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  209:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  210:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  211:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  212:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  213:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},1},
  214:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  215:         = L;
  216: 
  217: stats(?CLIENT, answer, rfc6733, L) ->
  218:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  219:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  220:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  221:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  222:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  223:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  224:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  225:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  226:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  227:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  228:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  229:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  230:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  231:         = L;
  232: 
  233: stats(?SERVER, answer, rfc6733, L) ->
  234:     [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  235:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  236:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  237:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  238:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  239:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  240:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  241:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  242:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  243:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  244:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  245:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  246:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  247:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  248:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  249:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  250:         = L;
  251: 
  252: stats(?CLIENT, answer_3xxx, rfc6733, L) ->
  253:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  254:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  255:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  256:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  257:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  258:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  259:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  260:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  261:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  262:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  263:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  264:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  265:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  266:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  267:         = L;
  268: 
  269: stats(?SERVER, answer_3xxx, rfc6733, L) ->
  270:     [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  271:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  272:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  273:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  274:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  275:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  276:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  277:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  278:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  279:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  280:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  281:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  282:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  283:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  284:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  285:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  286:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  287:         = L;
  288: 
  289: stats(?CLIENT, callback, rfc3588, L) ->
  290:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},1},
  291:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  292:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  293:      {{{0,275,0},recv},6},
  294:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  295:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  296:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  297:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  298:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  299:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  300:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},2}]
  301:         = L;
  302: 
  303: stats(?SERVER, callback, rfc3588, L) ->
  304:     [{{{unknown,0},send},1},
  305:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  306:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  307:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  308:      {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  309:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  310:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  311:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  312:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  313:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  314:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  315:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  316:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  317:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  318:         = L;
  319: 
  320: stats(?CLIENT, callback, rfc6733, L) ->
  321:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},1},
  322:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  323:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  324:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  325:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  326:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  327:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  328:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  329:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  330:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  331:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  332:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  333:         = L;
  334: 
  335: stats(?SERVER, callback, rfc6733, L) ->
  336:     [{{{unknown,0},send},1},
  337:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  338:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  339:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  340:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  341:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  342:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  343:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  344:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  345:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  346:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  347:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  348:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  349:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  350:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  351:         = L.
  352: 
  353: %% send_unknown_application/1
  354: %%
  355: %% Send an unknown application that a callback (which shouldn't take
  356: %% place) fails on.
  357: 
  358: %% diameter answers.
  359: send_unknown_application([_,_]) ->
  360:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3007,
  361:                                                  %% UNSUPPORTED_APPLICATION
  362:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  363:                                     'AVP' = []}
  364:         = call().
  365: 
  366: %% send_unknown_command/1
  367: %%
  368: %% Send a unknown command that a callback discards.
  369: 
  370: %% handle_request discards the request.
  371: send_unknown_command([callback, _]) ->
  372:     {error, timeout} = call();
  373: 
  374: %% diameter answers.
  375: send_unknown_command([_,_]) ->
  376:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3001,
  377:                                                  %% UNSUPPORTED_COMMAND
  378:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  379:                                     'AVP' = []}
  380:         = call().
  381: 
  382: %% send_ok/1
  383: %%
  384: %% Send a correct STR that a callback answers with 5002.
  385: 
  386: %% Callback answers.
  387: send_ok([_,_]) ->
  388:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5002,  %% UNKNOWN_SESSION_ID
  389:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  390:                        'AVP' = []}
  391:         = call().
  392: 
  393: %% send_invalid_hdr_bits/1
  394: %%
  395: %% Send a request with an incorrect E-bit that a callback ignores.
  396: 
  397: %% Callback answers.
  398: send_invalid_hdr_bits([callback, _]) ->
  399:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  400:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  401:                        'AVP' = []}
  402:         = call();
  403: 
  404: %% diameter answers.
  405: send_invalid_hdr_bits([_,_]) ->
  406:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3008, %% INVALID_HDR_BITS
  407:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  408:                                     'AVP' = []}
  409:         = call().
  410: 
  411: %% send_missing_avp/1
  412: %%
  413: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback answers.
  414: 
  415: %% diameter answers.
  416: send_missing_avp([answer, rfc6733]) ->
  417:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  418:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  419:                                     'AVP' = []}
  420:         = call();
  421: 
  422: %% Callback answers.
  423: send_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  424:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  425:                        'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  426:                        'AVP' = []}
  427:         = call().
  428: 
  429: %% send_ignore_missing_avp/1
  430: %%
  431: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback ignores.
  432: 
  433: %% diameter answers.
  434: send_ignore_missing_avp([answer, rfc6733]) ->
  435:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  436:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  437:                                     'AVP' = []}
  438:         = call();
  439: 
  440: %% Callback answers, ignores the error
  441: send_ignore_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  442:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  443:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  444:                        'AVP' = []}
  445:         = call().
  446: 
  447: %% send_5xxx_missing_avp/1
  448: %%
  449: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback answers
  450: %% with {answer_message, 5005}.
  451: 
  452: %% RFC 6733 allows 5xxx in an answer-message.
  453: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_, rfc6733]) ->
  454:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  455:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  456:                                     'AVP' = []}
  457:         = call();
  458: 
  459: %% RFC 3588 doesn't: sending answer fails.
  460: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_, rfc3588]) ->
  461:     {error, timeout} = call();
  462: 
  463: %% Callback answers, ignores the error
  464: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  465:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  466:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  467:                        'AVP' = []}
  468:         = call().
  469: 
  470: %% send_double_error/1
  471: %%
  472: %% Send a request with both an invalid E-bit and a missing AVP.
  473: 
  474: %% Callback answers with STA.
  475: send_double_error([callback, _]) ->
  476:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  477:                        'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  478:                        'AVP' = []}
  479:         = call();
  480: 
  481: %% diameter answers with answer-message.
  482: send_double_error([_,_]) ->
  483:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3008, %% INVALID_HDR_BITS
  484:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  485:                                     'AVP' = []}
  486:         = call().
  487: 
  488: %% send_3xxx/1
  489: %%
  490: %% Send a request that's answered with a 3xxx result code.
  491: 
  492: %% Callback answers.
  493: send_3xxx([_,_]) ->
  494:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3999,
  495:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  496:                                     'AVP' = []}
  497:         = call().
  498: 
  499: %% send_5xxx/1
  500: %%
  501: %% Send a request that's answered with a 5xxx result code.
  502: 
  503: %% Callback answers but fails since 5xxx isn't allowed in an RFC 3588
  504: %% answer-message.
  505: send_5xxx([_, rfc3588]) ->
  506:     {error, timeout} = call();
  507: 
  508: %% Callback answers.
  509: send_5xxx([_,_]) ->
  510:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5999,
  511:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  512:                                     'AVP' = []}
  513:         = call().
  514: 
  515: %% ===========================================================================
  516: 
  517: call() ->
  518:     Name = ?testcase(),
  519:     diameter:call(?CLIENT,
  520:                   ?DICT,
  521:                   #diameter_base_STR
  522:                   {'Termination-Cause' = ?LOGOUT,
  523:                    'Auth-Application-Id' = ?COMMON,
  524:                    'Class' = [?L(Name)]},
  525:                   [{extra, [Name]}]).
  526: 
  527: %% ===========================================================================
  528: %% diameter callbacks
  529: 
  530: %% peer_up/3
  531: 
  532: peer_up(_SvcName, _Peer, State) ->
  533:     State.
  534: 
  535: %% peer_down/3
  536: 
  537: peer_down(_SvcName, _Peer, State) ->
  538:     State.
  539: 
  540: %% pick_peer/5
  541: 
  542: pick_peer([Peer], _, ?CLIENT, _State, _Name) ->
  543:     {ok, Peer}.
  544: 
  545: %% prepare_request/4
  546: 
  547: prepare_request(Pkt, ?CLIENT, {_Ref, Caps}, Name) ->
  548:     {send, prepare(Pkt, Caps, Name)}.
  549: 
  550: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_unknown_application) ->
  551:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  552:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:8/binary, 0:32, T/binary>>}
  553:         = Pkt
  554:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  555: 
  556:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H/binary, 23:32, T/binary>>};
  557: 
  558: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_unknown_command) ->
  559:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  560:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:5/binary, 275:24, T/binary>>}
  561:         = Pkt
  562:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  563: 
  564:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H/binary, 572:24, T/binary>>};
  565: 
  566: prepare(Pkt, Caps, T)
  567:   when T == send_ok;
  568:        T == send_3xxx;
  569:        T == send_5xxx ->
  570:     sta(Pkt, Caps);
  571: 
  572: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_invalid_hdr_bits) ->
  573:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  574:     %% Set the E-bit to force 3008.
  575:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:34, 0:1, T/bitstring>>}
  576:         = Pkt
  577:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  578:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H:34, 1:1, T/bitstring>>};
  579: 
  580: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_double_error) ->
  581:     dehost(prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_invalid_hdr_bits));
  582: 
  583: prepare(Pkt, Caps, T)
  584:   when T == send_missing_avp;
  585:        T == send_ignore_missing_avp;
  586:        T == send_5xxx_missing_avp ->
  587:     Req = sta(Pkt, Caps),
  588:     dehost(diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt#diameter_packet{msg = Req})).
  589: 
  590: sta(Pkt, Caps) ->
  591:     #diameter_packet{msg = Req}
  592:         = Pkt,
  593:     #diameter_caps{origin_host  = {OH, _},
  594:                    origin_realm = {OR, DR}}
  595:         = Caps,
  596:     Req#diameter_base_STR{'Session-Id' = diameter:session_id(OH),
  597:                           'Origin-Host' = OH,
  598:                           'Origin-Realm' = OR,
  599:                           'Destination-Realm' = DR}.
  600: 
  601: %% Strip Origin-Host.
  602: dehost(#diameter_packet{bin = Bin} = Pkt) ->
  603:     <<V, Len:24, H:16/binary, T0/binary>>
  604:         = Bin,
  605:     {SessionId, T1} = split_avp(T0),
  606:     {OriginHost, T} = split_avp(T1),
  607:     Delta = size(OriginHost),
  608:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<V, (Len - Delta):24, H/binary,
  609:                                 SessionId/binary,
  610:                                 T/binary>>}.
  611: 
  612: %% handle_answer/5
  613: 
  614: handle_answer(Pkt, _Req, ?CLIENT, _Peer, _Name) ->
  615:     Pkt#diameter_packet.msg.
  616: 
  617: %% handle_error/5
  618: 
  619: handle_error(Reason, _Req, ?CLIENT, _Peer, _Name) ->
  620:     {error, Reason}.
  621: 
  622: split_avp(<<_:5/binary, Len:24, _/binary>> = Bin) ->
  623:     L = pad(Len),
  624:     <<Avp:L/binary, T/binary>> = Bin,
  625:     {Avp, T}.
  626: 
  627: pad(N)
  628:   when 0 == N rem 4 ->
  629:     N;
  630: pad(N) ->
  631:     N - (N rem 4) + 4.
  632: 
  633: %% handle_request/3
  634: 
  635: handle_request(#diameter_packet{header = #diameter_header{application_id = 0},
  636:                                 msg = Msg},
  637:                ?SERVER,
  638:                {_, Caps}) ->
  639:     request(Msg, Caps).
  640: 
  641: request(undefined, _) ->  %% unknown command
  642:     discard;
  643: 
  644: request(#diameter_base_STR{'Class' = [Name]} = Req, Caps) ->
  645:     request(?A(Name), Req, Caps).
  646: 
  647: request(send_ok, Req, Caps) ->
  648:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps),
  649:                              errors = [5002]}};  %% UNKNOWN_SESSION_ID
  650: 
  651: request(send_3xxx, _Req, _Caps) ->
  652:     {answer_message, 3999};
  653: 
  654: request(send_5xxx, _Req, _Caps) ->
  655:     {answer_message, 5999};
  656: 
  657: request(send_invalid_hdr_bits, Req, Caps) ->
  658:     %% Default errors field but a non-answer-message and only 3xxx
  659:     %% errors detected means diameter sets neither Result-Code nor
  660:     %% Failed-AVP.
  661:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps)}};
  662: 
  663: request(T, Req, Caps)
  664:   when T == send_double_error;
  665:        T == send_missing_avp ->
  666:     {reply, answer(Req, Caps)};
  667: 
  668: request(send_ignore_missing_avp, Req, Caps) ->
  669:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps),
  670:                              errors = false}};  %% ignore errors
  671: 
  672: request(send_5xxx_missing_avp, _Req, _Caps) ->
  673:     {answer_message, 5005}.  %% MISSING_AVP
  674: 
  675: answer(Req, Caps) ->
  676:     #diameter_base_STR{'Session-Id' = SId}
  677:         = Req,
  678:     #diameter_caps{origin_host = {OH,_},
  679:                    origin_realm = {OR,_}}
  680:         = Caps,
  681:     #diameter_base_STA{'Session-Id' = SId,
  682:                        'Origin-Host' = OH,
  683:                        'Origin-Realm' = OR,
  684:                        'Result-Code' = 2001}.  %% SUCCESS
